abstract: Kenneth C. Griffin, founder of the Citadel Investment Group, came about as close as legally possible Tuesday to advertise that his highflying $20 billion hedge fund is on the edge of going public, Dow Jones reported.
lead_paragraph: Kenneth C. Griffin, founder of the Citadel Investment Group, came about as close as legally possible Tuesday to advertise that his highflying $20 billion hedge fund is on the edge of going public, Dow Jones reported.

headline.main: Citadel’s Griffin Gives Mixed Signal on I.P.O.
